trans-unit.source: Animates from the <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> value of the previous key frame to its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*> using linear interpolation.
trans-unit.target: Anima a partir de <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> valor do quadro chave anterior para a sua própria <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*>usando interpolação linear.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Point> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada como parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection>em conjunto com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>para animar uma <xref:System.Windows.Point>valor da propriedade ao longo de um conjunto de quadros-chave.</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: Um quadro-chave define um segmento do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>ao qual ela pertence.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cada quadro chave tem um destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>Especifica a hora em que o quadro chave <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>deve ser alcançado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: Um quadro chave anima do valor de destino de quadro chave anterior a seu próprio valor de destino.

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: Ele começa quando o quadro chave anterior termina e termina quando é atingido sua própria chave de tempo.

trans-unit.source: Linear key frames like LinearPointKeyFrame create a smooth, linear interpolation between values.
trans-unit.target: Quadros-chave lineares como LinearPointKeyFrame criam uma interpolação linear suave entre valores.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearPointKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearPointKeyFrame"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearPointKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearPointKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com o valor final especificado.

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Valor (também conhecido como "valor de destino") para o quadro-chave de término.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearPointKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearPointKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com o valor e chave de hora especificada.

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Valor (também conhecido como "valor de destino") para o quadro-chave de término.

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Chave de tempo para o quadro-chave.

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de chave determina quando o valor de destino é atingido que também é quando o quadro chave termina.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearPointKeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearPointKeyFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, in a linear fashion, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: Interpola, de maneira linear entre o valor anterior de quadro-chave e o valor do quadro atual da chave, usando o incremento de andamento fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: O valor para animar do.

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0,0 e 1,0, inclusive, que especifica a porcentagem de tempo decorrido para este quadro-chave.

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: O valor de saída de quadro chave recebe o valor de base especificado e o andamento.
